html-meta-data.title: Windows NT 4.0 and Windows 95 Key Generator
html-meta-data.description: This Windows 95 styled website allows you to create Windows NT 4.0, Windows 95, Windows 98 and Office 7.0 keys. It supports different forms such as 10-digit, 11-digit, or OEM format. There's also a public API available!

oEmbed-meta-data.author_name: Free and open source on GitHub

pun-arr: Technophobes who want to make an exception
People who believe that "Linux" is a lifestyle
People who like to work Excel-lent
People who drink a cup of java in the morning
People who program pythons at the zoo
People who are obsessed with JavaScript
People who code in HTML, just like me!
